article_node.title: First Trust Portfolios Canada Announces Cap, Buffer and Dates of August Buffer ETF
article_node.summary: First Trust Canada announced the reset of the upside cap and the start of a new Target Outcome Period for the First Trust Vest U.S. Equity Buffer ETF – AUG (AUGB.F), aligning it with current market conditions. The fund aims to deliver returns that mirror the SPDR® S&P 500® ETF Trust (SPY) up to the capped level while offering a buffer against SPY losses, though units purchased after the first day may have different return potential. Portfolio managers Karan Sood and Trevor Lack oversee the strategy, and First Trust Canada serves as trustee, manager, and promoter of the ETF.
